**Example 1: 创建数据订阅实例**



Input: 

```
tccli dts CreateSubscribe --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --Product mysql \
    --PayType 1
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "SubscribeIds": [
            "subs-ieuwi83j2e"
        ],
        "RequestId": "14a719b5-ffb34ab6-816c43c1-8c6a23eb"
    }
}
```
